data.name: Generate horizontal charts with arrays
data.description:
# Task
Generate a simple horizontal chart in the form of a two-dimensional array based on the data inputs.

# Example
```javascript
generateHorizontalChartsWithArrays([["A",1],["B",2],["C",3],["D",4]])
[
"A -    1",
"B --   2",
"C ---  3",
"D ---- 4"
]
```

# Detail
1. --- to the space between the value of number: the longest content with a space and then add the number, the other content of the number position to be consistent with the longest
2. There should be a space between the value identifier (the first item of the parameter array) and ---.

# Write at end
Hey, now please start train this kata!

<small>Please give this kata a good feedback!</small>
